website_summaries.verdict: Designed exclusively for women, the Influence trainer from Ryka has gained a lot of fans with its cozy fit and feel. It’s been highly recommended as a shoe for Zumba and other workouts that include pivoting on the floor. On the downside, some purchasers have been disappointed in the sole's ability to support and cushion the foot.Still, the majority of reviewers find it a comfortable trainer that is worth the investment.
pros: The shoe’s women-oriented design fits like a glove, according to droves of purchasers
Many satisfied customers consider it a perfect trainer for Zumba and other dance-based classes
It offers ample support and accommodates foot pivoting
Based on multiple comments, this pair of training shoes from Ryka feels light and doesn’t weigh the foot down during quick movements
More than a few buyers find the look of the shoe to be stylish and appealing
cons: Several users have complained that wearing this trainer causes pain in their foot arch
A couple of testers have been disappointed with the shoe’s cushioning
They expected to receive more underfoot padding

customer_reviews.title: UK purchasers be careful with sizing...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these trainers and I think they'd be great in the right size. I ordered a UK 7 which is the size I always take - no exceptions - but they are just too small. I would return them and buy a size larger but I will only be reimbursed £20 in postage and as it is going to cost me £46 to ship them this is going to add over £20 to the cost of buying another pair... I'm really disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: MELANIE YENNADHIOU

customer_reviews.title: Great for Zumba
customer_reviews.text: I have been having very sore knees after Zumba before I got theses shoes .They are brilliant very bouncy sole the turning spot is great. I am now pain free will buy these again and have already recommended to several Zumba friends
customer_reviews.author: aunty

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable trainers
customer_reviews.text: Love the trainers I got which I needed for Zumba, I wasn’t sure in size as I like to try on before I buy but went off reviews. I am usually a size 6/7 uk size but got a size 8 as reviews said they were a bit small, and it was right! 8 is slightly big but still very comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Ryka trainers for several years now for classes/indoor gym work and have been injury free. Just started running again, now gyms are closed. Trainers are very supportive and do not rub. Comfy from the onset. No need to wear in gradually x
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution
customer_reviews.text: Unsure whether these are genuine article. Ordered size UK 5.5, box stated size UK 4 but still fitted. Seem poor quality (inner sole seems to be becoming unstuck/creased). Whilst unusual to complain about quick delivery these arrived after just three days (strange if ,as purported, coming from abroad) when initial delivery quoted was nearer three weeks. Not worn these yet so I reserve judgement but a bit concerned. Also disappointed to see they are made in China. No mention of that in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Zumba
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these shoes for Zumba classes as it was rated as the best shoe for that type of exercise. I would have rated it five stars but the first delivery got delivered to the wrong address, never to be seen again.
customer_reviews.author: Aarovic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Zumba Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from the US to UK and was hesitant but could not believe how quick they came, did pay for the priority delivery as I was worried they wouldn’t arrive in time for an event but literally took less than two days from ordering! Bought for Zumba as they came recommended and I’m extremely pleased with them. Apart from looking great they are so light and fit true to size (I’m a UK 6 and ordered a US 8) they are so comfy and perfect for Zumba.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley

customer_reviews.title: Happy now, sized small
customer_reviews.text: Now fit, the sizes are small I needed a whole shoe size larger and needed to return, postage was cheap, happy now though
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cushioning and support for dance, step and aerobic workouts in the gym.
customer_reviews.text: The best trainers for indoor gym activities such as dance, step and aerobics ever. This is my third pair. I don't wear any other brand anymore. The pivot point on the sole in particular makes a real difference, as well as the support for lateral movements.
customer_reviews.author: Blahblahblah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable trainer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these X trainers for zumba classes and have found that they are comfortable and fit well, (size 8.5 instead of my usual size 8), a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Mal Derby

customer_reviews.title: Great Zumba trainer
customer_reviews.text: After falling at Zumba and fracturing my hip I needed a trainer that I had confidence in. These were the ones. I read the reviews and ordered a size larger and they were just right. Delivery was earlier than stated so all good
customer_reviews.author: Tina Oakden

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: They are light and comfortable but supportive. My only trouble is I wanted to order a size 6 but every time I selected 6 the order defaulted to 5.5. I went with it because I'm a smallish 6 anyway and luckily they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Last time ordered my size but they were too small so went a half size up this time.
customer_reviews.text: Wear them for zumba. Great support as I have a problem with my feet - dropped arches.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but go a size up!
customer_reviews.text: From previous reviews I knew there was an issue with sizing, so I ordered a UK 7 instead of my usual UK 6, and was very glad I did. The fit was good and the shoe very comfortable. It's light and flexible, maybe not so supportive as a result. I am using it for Dance Aerobics-style classes and it's great. Only had the shoes a short time so no comment on durability. I have given a 4 star rating based on the issue with sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ryka Women's Influence Cross Trainer
product_meta.description: Keep up with the rest of the class in the ryka influence. This women's training sneaker features a synthetic and mesh upper for comfort and breathability. Flex-foil and direct-fuse layers provide plenty of support. The textile lining and cushioning precise-return insole help keep your feet nice and comfortable. A dual impact midsole provides cushioning in the heel and forefront. This ryka sneaker also has a traction outsole with a footprint design. Move to the beat of your own drum with the ryka influence.
feature_bullets: Dual density foam midsole with high impact N-Gage EVA energy return provides shape retention and cushioning on impact
